"Yes, it is all very horrid," interrupted Pierre, "very horrid." 
Pierre was still afraid that this officer might inadvertently say something disconcerting to himself. 
"And it must seem to you," said Boris flush- ing slightly, but not changing his tone or atti- tude, "it must seem to you that everyone is try- ing to get something out of the rich man?" 
"So it does," thought Pierre.
